english_example_sentence: As soon as his mother allowed, the little child immediately ran outside.
russian_example_sentence: Как только мать разрешила, маленький ребенок сразу выбежал на улицу.
turkish_example_sentence: Annem izin verince, küçük çocuk hemen dışarı koştu.
